CustomField.description: After a new Line Item record is created and saved, the Sort Order will be automatically populated as 1 + the highest Sort Order. So if it's the 3rd Line Item on the Invoice, the value will be 3.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: After a new Line Item record is created and saved, the Sort Order will be automatically populated as 1 + the highest Sort Order. So if it's the 3rd Line Item on the Invoice, the value will be 3.
CustomField.label: Sort Order
